info.title: Ingestion API
info.description: API powering the Data Ingestion connectors of Algolia.

tags.name: authentications
tags.description: An authentication describe the way we connect to Algolia, or any supported connector.

tags.name: destinations
tags.description: A destination refers to an Algolia product (Search, Insight, Recommend, ...).

tags.name: observability
tags.description: The observability API associates a run to a task execution.

tags.name: sources
tags.description: A source describe the platform informations.

tags.name: tasks
tags.description: A Task describe how we fetch the data (onDemand, schedule, subscription) from a source and how we index it on the Algolia side.

get.summary: Send requests to the Algolia REST API.
get.description: This method allow you to send requests to the Algolia REST API.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the API endpoint to target, anything after the /1 needs to be specified.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Query parameters to be applied to the current query.

402.description: This feature is not enabled on your Algolia account.

403.description: Method not allowed with this API key.

requestBody.description: The parameters to send with the custom request.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Query parameters to be applied to the current query.

403.description: Method not allowed with this API key.

requestBody.description: The parameters to send with the custom request.

get.description: Get a list of authentications for the given query parameters, with pagination details.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, starting at 1.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the authentications to retrieve.

items.description: Type of the Authentication, defines what kind of object is stored in the input.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform of the authentications to retrieve.

oneOf.description: Describe which platform the Authentication is used for.
Used to filter Authentication without platform property.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The key by which the list should be sorted.

schema.description: Used to sort the Authentication list endpoint.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the returned list.

schema.description: Used to order a sorted request.

get.description: Get a list of sources for the given query parameters, with pagination details.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, starting at 1.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the sources to retrieve.

parameters.name: authenticationID
parameters.description: The authenticationIDs of the sources to retrieve. 'none' returns sources that doesn't have an authentication.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The key by which the list should be sorted.

schema.description: Used to sort the Source list endpoint.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the returned list.

schema.description: Used to order a sorted request.

items.description: Unique and immutable key of the referenced Store.

locales.description: Array of locales that must match the following pattern: ^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?$. For example ["fr-FR", "en"].

storeHash.description: The store hash identifying the store the shopper is signing in to.

id.description: The ID of the bigcommerce channel.

currencies.description: An array of currencies for the given channel `ID`, a currency is a trigram string that represents the currency code.

uniqueIDColumn.description: The name of the column that contains the unique ID, used as `objectID` in Algolia.
The name of the column that contains the unique ID, used as `objectID` in Algolia.

mapping.description: Mapping of type for every column. For example {"myColumn": "boolean", "myOtherColumn": "json"}.

delimiter.description: The character used to split the value on each line, default to a comma (\r, \n, 0xFFFD, and space are forbidden).

projectID.description: Project ID of the BigQuery Source.

datasetID.description: Dataset ID of the BigQuery Source.

customSQLRequest.description: Custom SQL request to extract data from the BigQuery table.

uniqueIDColumn.description: The name of the column that contains the unique ID, used as `objectID` in Algolia.

registry.description: The registry where the image is stored.

image.description: The name of the image to pull.

version.description: The version of the image, defaults to `latest`.

outputFile.description: The full name of the output file.

get.description: Get a list of tasks for the given query parameters, with pagination details.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, starting at 1.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action of the tasks to retrieve.

schema.description: An array of actions to perform on the Algolia index.

items.description: The action to perform on the Algolia index.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the task is enabled or not.

parameters.name: sourceID
parameters.description: The sourceIDs of the tasks to retrive.

parameters.name: destinationID
parameters.description: The destinationIDs of the tasks to retrive.

parameters.name: triggerType
parameters.description: The trigger type of the task.

items.description:
The type of the task reflect how it can be used:
  - onDemand: a task that runs manually
  - schedule: a task that runs regularly, following a given cron expression
  - subscription: a task that runs after a subscription event is received from an integration (e.g. Webhook).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The key by which the list should be sorted.

schema.description: Used to sort the Task list endpoint.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the returned list.

schema.description: Used to order a sorted request.

schema.title: listTasksResponse
schema.description: A list of tasks with pagination details.

oneOf.description: The trigger information of a task of type `onDemand`.

type.description: A task which is manually executed via the run task endpoint.

lastRun.description: The last time the scheduled task ran (RFC3339 format).

oneOf.description: The trigger information for a task of type 'schedule'.

type.description: A task which is triggered by a schedule (cron expression).

cron.description: A cron expression that represent at which regularity the task should run.

lastRun.description: The last time the scheduled task ran (RFC3339 format).

nextRun.description: The next scheduled run of the task (RFC3339 format).

oneOf.description: The trigger input for a task of type 'subscription'.

type.description: A task which is triggered by an external subscription (e.g. Webhook).

oneOf.description: The input for an `onDemand` task whose source is of type `bigquery` and for which extracted data spans a given time range.

startDate.description: The start date of the extraction (RFC3339 format).

endDate.description: The end date of the extraction (RFC3339 format).

oneOf.description: The input for a `schedule` task whose source is of type `bigquery` and for which extracted data spans a fixed number of days.

timeframe.description: The timeframe of the extraction, in number of days from today.

enabled.description: Whether the task is enabled or not.

action.description: The action to perform on the Algolia index.

get.description: Get a list of runs for the given query parameters, with pagination details.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, starting at 1.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the status of the runs.

parameters.name: taskID
parameters.description: Filter by taskID.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The key by which the list should be sorted.

schema.description: Used to sort the Run list endpoint.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the returned list.

schema.description: Used to order a sorted request.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
The start date (in RFC3339 format) of the runs fetching window.
Defaults to 'now'-7 days if omitted. The timespan between `startDate` and `endDate` must be smaller than 7 days.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
The end date (in RFC3339 format) of the runs fetching window.
Defaults to 'now' days if omitted. The timespan between `startDate` and `endDate` must be smaller than 7 days.

reasonCode.description: An identifier that pairs with the outcome reason.

get.description: Get a single run for the given ID.

parameters.name: runID
parameters.description: The run UUID.

reasonCode.description: An identifier that pairs with the outcome reason.

get.description: Get a list of events associated to the given runID, for the given query parameters.

parameters.name: runID
parameters.description: The run UUID.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, starting at 1.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the status of the events.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter the type of the events.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The key by which the list should be sorted.

schema.description: Used to sort the Event list endpoint.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the returned list.

schema.description: Used to order a sorted request.

items.description: An event describe a step of the task execution flow..

parentID.description: The parent event, the cause of this event.

get.description: Get a single event for a specific runID.

parameters.name: runID
parameters.description: The run UUID.

parameters.name: eventID
parameters.description: The event UUID.

schema.description: An event describe a step of the task execution flow..

parentID.description: The parent event, the cause of this event.
